movie.title: The Matrix
movie.awards: Won 4 Oscars. Another 35 wins and 40 nominations.
movie.plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movie.actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving

movie.title: Big
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins and 12 nominations.
movie.plot: When a boy wishes to be big at a magic wish machine, he wakes up the next morning and finds himself in an adult body.
movie.actors: Tom Hanks, Elizabeth Perkins, Robert Loggia, John Heard

movie.title: A Bug's Life
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins and 19 nominations.
movie.plot: A misfit ant, looking for 'warriors' to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
movie.actors: Dave Foley, Kevin Spacey, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Hayden Panettiere
movie.writer: John Lasseter (original story by), Andrew Stanton (original story by), Joe Ranft (original story by), Andrew Stanton (screenplay), Don McEnery (screenplay), Bob Shaw (screenplay), Geefwee Boedoe (additional writer), Jason Katz (additional writer), Jorgen Klubien (additional writer), Robert Lence (additional writer), David Reynolds (additional writer)
